about.title: About me
about.name: Name: Tokmin Roman
about.info: I’m a beginner web-developer currently employed by Eltex, where I develop the interface of network hardware and also help it to communicate with hardware systems. I Began to learn programming in NSTU by making a laboratory using С/С++ and making a task manager for my diploma using HTML/JS. Also in my free time I write my own projects. Now I am learning React and Node JS, and I am very interested in these technologies. Like writing documentation for projects, also like pizza and video games!

education.title: Novosibirsk State Technical University
education.info: During the training, I worked with various Plis\Arduino boards, also studied the basics of the linux system, which I liked the most and worked as a laboratory with various network equipment. I also studied JavaScript in parallel, which was useful for implementing my application for bachelor's work. Now I am continuing my master's degree in this direction.

work.title: ENTERPRISE «ELTEX» —
rows: company is one of the leading Russian manufacturers of telecommunications equipment.
work.info: My first job as a web developer, where the hardware frontend is written in Knockoutjs, requests to the system were made by Lua and a small layer of system code to make system calls. Here I fixed bugs, added functionality, and also transferred projects from Knockoutjs to Angular. I wrote a lot of documentation, which simplified the work of other developers, put old projects in order and raised new ones. I learned a lot of new things from my colleagues, which I am very grateful to them for!
